title: That Other Woman
lyrics:
I can't be that other woman
I can't be that other woman
[Verse 1: Charisse 
with Cassandra
]
You only see me every Friday night at nine
Can't imagine what you told her this time
You never take me to a public place
Worried that somebody might notice your face
Rush to the liquor store and then a motel (
Motel
)
Call up your friends just to cover you're trail
Not a word until the week goes by
You call me when you want some pie
[Pre-Chorus: Charisse 
with Cassandra
]
Why am I crying
 every night over you
You're never gonna leave her
Finally I woke up
 and smell the coffee
I understand
Why two women can't share one man

I can't be that other woman (Woman)
I can't love you down (No, no)
Can't keep creepin' around
Can't be that other woman
Yes, I want you bad (Bad)
But she needs you much more
I can't be that other woman
I can't love you down (No, no-no, no)
Can't keep creepin' around
Can't be that other woman (Can't be, no)
Yes, I want you bad
But she needs you much more
[Verse 2: Cassandra, 
with Charisse
]
You never see me on the holidays
You disappear and won't return my page
You take my body in the middle of night
I ain't gon lie cause boy you do it so right
And then you melt me with them same three words
Sweetest seduction that I've ever heard
And in the morning with the sun rise
You run to her I realize
[Pre-Chorus: Cassandra, 
with Charisse
]
Why am I crying
 every night over you
You're never gonna leave her
Finally I woke up
 and smell the coffee
I understand
Why two women can't share one man

I can't be that other woman (No, no, no, no, no, no, no)
I can't love you down
Can't keep creepin' around
Can't be that other woman
Yes, I want you bad
But she needs you much more
I can't be that other woman (See)
I can't love you down (What goes around comes around)
Can't keep creepin' around
Can't be that other woman
Yes, I want you bad (I want you oh so bad)
But she needs you much more (Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah)
[Bridge: Cassandra, 
Charisse
]
Can I get a witness?
Yes you can
Well, can I get a witness?
Oh yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah
Can I get a witness?
You know you can
Have you ever been in love with another girl's man?
Can I get a witness?
Yes you can
Can I get a witness?
Oh yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah
You said you're leaving a thousand times
But I won't believe till the papers are signed
[Break: 
Changing Faces
, Charisse, 
Cassandra
]
Can't be that other woman
I won't believe it no
I gotta be the only one
 (Can't be no)
Yes, I want you bad
But she needs you much more
[Chorus: Changing Faces (Charisse, 
Cassandra
)]
I can't be that other woman
I can't love you down (I can't, no)
Can't keep creepin' around (
No more late night booty calls
)
Can't be that other woman
Yes, I want you bad (Woman, no)
But she needs you much more

In the morning with sunrise
You will run to her
No, you're never gonna leave her
So I'm saying goodbye
In the morning with sunrise
You will run to her
No, you're never gonna leave her
So I'm saying goodbye

I can't be that other woman (Can't be that other woman)
I can't love you down
Can't keep creepin' around (Can't be that other wo-o-oman)
Can't be that other woman (Can't be that other woman)
Yes, I want you bad
But she needs you much more (She needs)
I can't be that other woman
I can't love you down
Can't keep creepin' around
Can't be that other woman
Yes, I want you bad
